# Vercel build error in Background.tsx (2025-09-27 12:17Z)

_**User (2025-09-27 02:52Z)**_

Vercel isn't building @Background.tsx ./app/components/Background.tsx
145:9  Error: 'program' is never reassigned. Use 'const' instead.  prefer-const

---

_**Agent (model default, mode Agent)**_

Fixing the lint error in `Background.tsx`: `program` is declared with `let` but never reassigned. Switching it to `const`.


---

<tool-use data-tool-type="write" data-tool-name="search_replace">

<details><summary>Tool use: **code_edit** • Edit file: app/components/Background.tsx</summary>

**Chunk 1**
Lines added: 1, lines removed: 1

```diff
@@ -143,5 +143,5 @@
      gl.canvas.style.backgroundColor = &#39;white&#39;;
  
-     let program: Program | undefined;
+     const program: Program | undefined;
  
      function resize() {
```

</details>

</tool-use>

---

`program` is declared with `let` but never reassigned. It’s assigned once and only read afterward, so it should be `const`. This resolves the lint error and should unblock the Vercel build.
